activities: Dixon Hughes Goodman LLP (“DHG”) is a professional services firm providing assurance, tax and consulting services.  DHG uses personal information pertaining to: (1) current, former or prospective DHG personnel in connection with the management and operation of DHG, providing services, benefits to and maintaining contact with such personnel; (2) current, former or prospective clients and their personnel in connection with promoting, providing and offering services to such clients and to adhere to professional obligations pertaining to such services; (3) third parties (for example, vendors) and their personnel in connection with managing the business activities with those third parties.  To a limited extent, Dixon Hughes Goodman LLP may use personal information obtained via our website in order to respond to requests from the general public.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA); and EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for human resource data only
